mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messages (chat_id, sender_id, receiver_id, content, refer_msg_id, reaction, is_read, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{chat_id}, #{sender_id}, #{receiver_id}, #{content}, #{refer_msg_id}, #{reaction}, #{is_read}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM messages WHERE (sender_id = #{user1_id} AND receiver_id = #{user2_id}) OR (sender_id = #{user2_id} AND receiver_id = #{user1_id}) ORDER BY created_at
